Reviews.Title: Great deal. great product. fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Mr. FC
Reviews.Content: All items we're true and exact as described by the seller. All were functioning.. lenses, camera, tripod, chargers, memory card, batteries and the battery grip. A very great deal.but then 1 hour after, the BG's buttons were not functioning anymore. I don't know what happened. I tried to remove the battery grip and put it back it on but it's still the same, although the battery grip's purpose to supply added power still works. I guess I have to stick with this for the meantime.Everything else is perfectly fine, for now.Update: they replaced the battery grip and its perfectly working.Update: The bag gave up, ripped off on sides, and the tripod isn't very sturdy and balanced.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly.. Images come out great
Reviews.Author: R. A. Silva "diskhead"
Reviews.Content: I've had it for more than a year took it travelling.. Excellent!! Its not professional grade.. But it does the job perfectly

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: snap happy
Reviews.Content: This product was just as I had expected. Packaged carefully. Shipped before the estimated day. Actually arrived two days earlier than allotted. Love my product.

Reviews.Title: yes
Reviews.Author: nickiel
Reviews.Content: Would buy it all over, love the camera!!! I had something missing from my order that was quickly replaced.  This kit is worth the price.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & Canon 55-250IS Lens + 58mm 2x Telephoto lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens (4 Lens Kit!!!!!!) W/32GB SDHC Memory+ Battery Grip + 2 Extra Batteries + Charger + 3 Piece Filter Kit + UV Filter + Full Size Tripod + Case +Accessory Kit!
